mean_cn: n. 灰泥，石膏；  v. 抹泥
mean_en: a substance made of lime, water and sand, that is put on walls and ceilings to give them a smooth hard surface; a white powder that is mixed with water and becomes very hard when it dries, used especially for making copies of statues or holding broken bones in place
sentence: Her broken arm is still in plaster.
sentence_trans: 她骨折的手臂还打着石膏。
word_etyma: plast塑造 + er表名词 → 塑造用的东西 → 石膏；灰泥
